definition: to sew together/suture (in surgery)/to sew up (a wound)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Examine the seams of the sports bras.
sentences.chinese: 仔细检查运动胸罩的缝合处。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of continuous suture in aortic valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉瓣置换中连续缝合方法的应用。

sentences.english: But he is proud to show off the scars and stitch-marks that cover his belly.
sentences.chinese: 但他却很乐意炫耀自己肚子上的刀疤和缝合的印记。

sentences.english: In cesarean section, the peritoneum should be sutured to provide a favorable condition for next operation.
sentences.chinese: 行剖宫产术时应缝合腹膜，为下次手术创造有利条件。

sentences.english: The recipient bladder and donor bladder patch were then anastomosed.
sentences.chinese: 供体膀胱瓣与受体膀胱全层缝合。

sentences.english: It proves that the Jinshajiang suture zone could not have formed the main suture zone in the Paleo-Tethys domain.
sentences.chinese: 因此，金沙江带不能作为古特提斯域的主缝合带。

sentences.english: They were sutured with 100 Nylon lines.
I hope that the roller crushing, welding machine, I can not suture the sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 压路机压碎我的希望，电焊机也不能缝合我的悲伤。

sentences.english: This is the first report of Triassic Radiolaria within the Yarlung-Zangbo Suture Zone.
sentences.chinese: 这是雅鲁藏布江缝合带三叠纪放射虫的首次报告。

sentences.english: The disposable and atraumatic suture needle with catgut suture applies to obstetrics and gynaecology department.
sentences.chinese: 无菌医用羊肠线无损伤缝合针，适用于妇产科手术。

sentences.english: The temple will serve for an operating room.
sentences.chinese: 那座庙将用来作为切除缝合室。

sentences.english: Stitched, thong toe post for easy slip-on.
sentences.chinese: 缝合，丁字裤容易脚趾后滑。

sentences.english: There was no association between RPH and arterial sheath size or deployment of a vascular closure device.
sentences.chinese: 腹膜后血肿与动脉导管尺寸和血管缝合器的应用无关。

sentences.english: Plus, full seam sealing reinforces all stitching lines to stop moisture short.
sentences.chinese: 另外，全煤封口缝合线，以加强所有停止水分短。

definition: slang/argot/private language used as secret code
incision/notch/slit/gash/margin of a page/trimmed edge (of a page in a book)
welt seam (doubled over and sewed again from topside)
